title: GDG CEE Summit 2016 Announced
brief: GDG CEE Summit is a place for organizers to meet and connect with neighbor organizers and share their experiences, so prepare for a weekend full of hard work and surprises!

title: Present your group
brief: The core idea of the event is to get introduced to all neighbour organizers and make new friends, so _each attending GDG chapter must prepare a small presentation_ to introduce themselves.
